name: Game & Gaming
description: A category focused on games and gaming experiences, including on-chain games, NFT-based games, and interactive entertainment. This category highlights the intersection of gaming with blockchain technology and digital art.

sub_categories.name: Board Game
sub_categories.description: A sub-category dedicated to board games that leverage blockchain technology, including digital versions of classic board games and new on-chain board game experiences.

sub_categories.name: Retro
sub_categories.description: A sub-category focused on retro-themed projects and experiences, emphasizing nostalgia and classic gaming, with a twist of modern blockchain technology.
